name: Witch’s Mushrooms Makeup-Plant Designer
description:
Witch’s Mushrooms Makeup is a magic beauty dressup game.
The beautiful witch as you can see,she is smart and talent at magical and dressup things,she can use the plant to do something different.She can control it and use it,but before that she need to nurture them.Would you like to help her?Come!

Game Features:
- Pretty witch's dressup studio
- Magical plant designer help you dress up beautiful girl
- Exquisite and clearly frames,vivid images
- Comfortable color matching make you better enjoy this game
- Simple operations make you easy to play Witch’s Mushrooms Makeup
